DOC.brief_summary: Low Intensity Shock Wave Therapy ( LI-ESWT ) show beneficial effect ED patient respond PDE5i 's . This study aim determine capability swt convert PDE5 inhibitor non responder sexually function male PDE5i therapy .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Low Intensity Shock Wave Therapy ED PDE5i Non Responders
DOC.detailed_description: We include severe ED patient ( 60 % diabetic , 85 % cardiovascular disease ) fail respond PDE5i therapy , score 0-2 rigidity scale ( RS ) PDE5i therapy.Treatment include 2 sessions/week 3 week , repeat 3-week no-treatment interval . At session LI-ESWT apply penile shaft crus 3 minute 5 different penile anatomical site ( intensity 0.09 mj/mm2 , 300 shocks/site ) . One-month end treatment baseline assessment repeat . An active PDE5i medication regime provide final erectile function reassess . Main endpoints success change RS International Index Erectile Function ( IIEF-ED ) Domain score . We find LI-ESWT effectively treat severe ED patient fail PDE5i therapy . This study emphasise physiological effect LI-ESWT erectile mechanism .
